text: Ko fii, ko Ibuliisa woni baaba mon, e hin-le hiɗon faalaa waɗude faaleeji baaba mon ɗin. On-le o woniino waroowo gila ka fuɗɗoode, o jaɓaali daraade e goonga, ɓay goonga on alaa e makko. Nde o wowli fenaande nden woo, haray ɗun ko e jikku makko on iwri, ko fii ko o fenoowo, awa kadi ko o baaba penaale.
